name: I FEEL IT EVERY LATE MORNING
name_original: I FEEL IT EVERY LATE MORNING
description:
HEADPHONES ARE STRONGLY RECOMMENDED!

The game should be played in Chrome. It may work incorrectly in other browsers!

You can walk around the room with arrows on your keyboard.

This game is about... About turning the light on and off. You turn the light off, than you turn the light on and nothing happens. Well, almost. Made for LD30.

Ludum Dare page: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=27375
